00027 #ifndef REIFY_TRUE_OLD_H
00028 #define REIFY_TRUE_OLD_H
00029 
00030 #include "constraint_abstract.h"
00031 #include "../minion.h"
00032 #include "../get_info/get_info.h"
00033 #include "../queue/standard_queue.h"
00034 #include "../dynamic_constraints/old_dynamic_reifyimply.h"
00035 
00036 
00037 template<typename BoolVar>
00038 struct reify_true_old : public AbstractConstraint
00039 {
00040   virtual string constraint_name()
00041   { return "ReifyTrue:" + poscon->constraint_name(); }
00042   
00043   AbstractConstraint* poscon;
00044   BoolVar rar_var;
00045   bool constraint_locked;
00046   
00047   Reversible<bool> full_propagate_called;
00048   
00049   reify_true_old(StateObj* _stateObj, AbstractConstraint* _poscon, BoolVar v) : AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), poscon(_poscon), 
00050                                                                             rar_var(v), constraint_locked(false),
00051                                                                             full_propagate_called(stateObj, false)
00052   { }
00053   
00054   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00055   { D_FATAL_ERROR("You can't reverse a reified Constraint!"); }
00056   
00057   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00058   {
00059     
00060     DomainInt back_val = *(v + v_size - 1);
00061     //v.pop_back();
00062     if(back_val != 0)
00063       return poscon->check_assignment(v, v_size - 1);
00064     else
00065       return true;
00066   }
00067   
00068   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00069   { 
00070     vector<AnyVarRef> vec = poscon->get_vars();
00071     vec.push_back(rar_var);
00072     return vec;
00073   }
00074   
00075   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00076   {
00077     triggerCollection postrig = poscon->setup_internal();
00078     triggerCollection triggers;
00079     for(unsigned int i=0;i<postrig.size();i++)
00080     {
00081       postrig[i]->trigger.constraint = this;
00082       D_ASSERT(postrig[i]->trigger.info != -99999);
00083       triggers.push_back(postrig[i]);
00084     }
00085     triggers.push_back(make_trigger(rar_var, Trigger(this, -99999), LowerBound));
00086     return triggers;
00087   }
00088   
00089   virtual void special_check()
00090   {
00091     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00092     constraint_locked = false;
00093     poscon->full_propagate();
00094     full_propagate_called = true;
00095   }
00096   
00097   virtual void special_unlock()
00098   {
00099     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00100     constraint_locked = false;
00101   }
00102   
00103   virtual void propagate(int i, DomainDelta domain)
00104   {
00105     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ReifyTrue);
00106     if(constraint_locked)
00107       return;
00108 
00109     if(i == -99999)
00110     {
00111       constraint_locked = true;
00112       getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00113       return;
00114     }
00115     
00116     if(full_propagate_called)
00117     {
00118       D_ASSERT(rar_var.isAssigned() && rar_var.getAssignedValue() == 1);
00119       poscon->propagate(i, domain);
00120       return;
00121     }
00122     
00123     if(!rar_var.isAssigned()) { //don't check unsat if rar_var=0
00124 #ifdef MINION_DEBUG
00125       bool flag;
00126       GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment0, poscon);
00127       bool unsat = poscon->check_unsat(i, domain);
00128       D_ASSERT((!flag && unsat) || (flag && !unsat));
00129 #endif
00130       PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ReifyImplyCheckUnsat);
00131       if(poscon->check_unsat(i, domain)) 
00132     { rar_var.propagateAssign(false); }
00133     }
00134   }
00135   
00136   virtual void full_propagate()
00137   {
00138     #ifdef MINION_DEBUG
00139     {
00140       bool flag;
00141       GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment0, poscon);
00142       bool unsat = poscon->full_check_unsat();
00143       D_ASSERT((!flag && unsat) || (flag && !unsat));
00144     }
00145     #endif
00146     
00147     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ReifyImplyFullCheckUnsat);
00148     if(poscon->full_check_unsat())
00149       rar_var.propagateAssign(false);
00150 
00151     if(rar_var.isAssigned() && rar_var.getAssignedValue() > 0)
00152     {
00153       poscon->full_propagate();
00154       full_propagate_called = true;
00155     }
00156   }
00157 };
00158 
00159 // From dynamic_reifyimply.h
00160 template<typename BoolVar>
00161 AbstractConstraint*
00162 truereifyConDynamicOld(StateObj* stateObj, AbstractConstraint* c, BoolVar var);
00163 
00164 template<typename BoolVar>
00165 AbstractConstraint*
00166 truereifyConOld(StateObj* stateObj, AbstractConstraint* c, BoolVar var)
00167 { 
00168   if(c->dynamic_trigger_count() == 0)
00169     return new reify_true_old<BoolVar>(stateObj, &*c, var); 
00170   else
00171     return truereifyConDynamicOld(stateObj, c, var);
00172 }
00173 
00174 template<typename VarArray>
00175 inline AbstractConstraint*
00176 BuildCT_REIFYIMPLY_OLD(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& vars, ConstraintBlob& bl)
00177 {
00178   D_ASSERT(bl.internal_constraints.size() == 1);
00179   D_ASSERT(vars.size() == 1);
00180   return truereifyConOld(stateObj, build_constraint(stateObj, bl.internal_constraints[0]), vars[0]);
00181 }
00182 
00183 #endif
